channel.title: (nooby)Starting Inventory
channel.description:
alright, so i came across ddsspeced source and all and it was great, and asked my friend, should i edit this? hes like go for it blah blah blah...
so i got to the point where i put turned the quests off, cuz u log in and boom u have the quests.. and i thought maybe i can give them 50-75m to start off, instead of 25m.
so im looking for my files for about 1 hour, looked through EVERY .java file i have. Player.java, PlayerHandler.java, ECT... and i lol'd cuz i could not find where to edit the starting inventory. i will post what my player.java or playerhandler.java looks like, if someone can tell me if those are the right files.

item.title: (nooby)Starting Inventory
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

[quote=“jacked4fun1, post:4, topic:244765”]none of those ill help u it should look somewhat like this:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
sendMessage(“Go to the skilling area on the emote tablet if you need more money.”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… ");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one starter package lulz ");

        }
    }[/code][/quote]

ddsspeced is a delta source, search for 995,25000000

Read full topic

item.title: (nooby)Starting Inventory
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

[quote=“iam3ni, post:8, topic:244765”][quote author=M0D 1ST link=topic=321161.msg2540469#msg2540469 date=1226970244]

alright, so i came across ddsspeced source and all and it was great, and asked my friend, should i edit this? hes like go for it blah blah blah…

so i got to the point where i put turned the quests off, cuz u log in and boom u have the quests… and i thought maybe i can give them 50-75m to start off, instead of 25m.

so im looking for my files for about 1 hour, looked through EVERY .java file i have. Player.java, PlayerHandler.java, ECT… and i lol’d cuz i could not find where to edit the starting inventory. i will post what my player.java or playerhandler.java looks like, if someone can tell me if those are the right files.

[/quote] that has got to b the lamest begginig coder story i have ever heard

are u stupid? not all sources are the same…maybe im not the very best at coding? tony was at my position at 1 point in time…if u expect me to “know” this then gtfo my thread[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2008, 07:08:50 pm[/size][hr][quote author=jacked4fun1 link=topic=321161.msg2540468#msg2540468 date=1226970174]
none of those ill help u it should look somewhat like this:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
sendMessage(“Go to the skilling area on the emote tablet if you need more money.”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… ");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one starter package lulz ");

        }
    }[/code]

[/quote]

suppost to be in client.java?[/quote]

LOL. Shut up, if you really did look thru all your files youd find it.

Read full topic

item.title: (nooby)Starting Inventory
item.dc:creator: @hamza hamza
item.description:
@hamza wrote:

[quote=“iam3ni, post:3, topic:244765”]well theres like 7 places that say starter things that have the phrase starter…

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1;

} else if (token.equals("character-starter")) {
starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length());

any of those?[/quote]
Dont make command coz it wont fix it …
Try using the first code u gave
There will stand like this

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1;
Then beneath it there will be like these
addItem(995,25000000)
Now change the 25000000 To the ammount u want.

Read full topic
